author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Hope this can be merged because it breaks some other codes. Thank you very much!
@StefanKarpinski I am sorry for bugging you but we need this accepted because it breaks some other packages of ours. Thank you very much!

I've created release `v0.6.0`, [here](https://github.com/madsjulia/BIGUQ.jl/releases/tag/v0.6.0) it is.
<!-- cb6641b0-f05a-11e9-8f4a-01f444c0dc53 -->
